title: Why must I still walk into the bush when Oracle's has revealed a threat?
body: I constantly get hit by a blanket of Teemo mushrooms which I've already revealed with Oracle's because I can't attack them without walking into the bush.  How does it make any sense that I can identify a threat but not attack it?  Please fix this, I'm really sick of being blamed for "yeeting into mushrooms" when I'm just trying to clear them.
